Okay, for the first-timers:

1. This is OSX Mountain Lion 10.8.3 that has been downloaded directly from the app store. FatFreddy733 says that nothing has been modified.

2.If you want to make your own "Hackintosh" from this file and you have access to a MacBook or iMac, then follow this guide

http://www.tonymacx86.com/61-unibeast-install-os-x-mountain-lion-any-supported-intel-based-pc.html

3. If you do not own/have a Mac, then you're screwed. This is the wrong torrent for you. What you're looking for is the Snow Leopard retail dvd. Without it, you cant create a "Hackintosh". Once you install Snow Leopard, then come back and download this.
